alert.note: Alert for Clay; Clinton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 6:28PM CST until December 15 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN DAVIESS...SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON...EASTERN CLAY... RAY...WESTERN CARROLL...CALDWELL AND LIVINGSTON COUNTIES... At 628 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gallatin to 6 miles east of Lathrop to near Excelsior Springs, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Liberty, Excelsior Springs, Cameron, Chillicothe, Kearney, Richmond, Lexington, Carrollton, Lawson, Lathrop, Hamilton, Braymer, Orrick, Norborne, Polo, Hardin, Holt, Breckenridge, Henrietta and Crystal Lakes. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 23 and 53. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
